To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SortinoRatio _sortino;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sortino = SORTINO(symbol, sortinoPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_sortino.IsReady)
{
    var current = _sortino.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sortino = self.SORTINO(symbol, sortinoPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.sortino.IsReady:
    current = self.sortino.Current.Value
